classes.cCustomNote: Select one of the following: SPAN101, SPAN102, SPAN103, SPAN111.
classes.cCustomID: Elementary Spanish I, II, III, or Hispanic Language & Culture

classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, C1, C2, Lower-Division C, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division C and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Select one of the following: AGB214, BUS212.

16 units of Approved Electives (at least 8 must be upper-division). See catalog. Consultation with advisor is recommended; bear in mind your selections may impact pursuit of post-baccalaureate studies and/or goals. Max 2 units of AEPS200 and/or max 2 units of AEPS400 may count towards Approved Electives. Max 4 units of AEPS339 may count towards Approved Electives.

Students can attempt to fulfill the requirement after 90 earned units; students should complete the requirements before senior year. Refer to current catalog for prerequisites. Any GWR class or GWR exam can go here.
